ComicInfo.Title: Death of Ashley J Williams Part 2
ComicInfo.Summary:
Unlucky (although in Ash's case, everything is unlucky) issue #13 is here! In the past, dynamite has killed Ash, sent him to fight the Marvel Zombies, hooked him up with Xena, Freddy, Ash and Jason (not all at once)... so what do they have planned for this issue?
The Death of Ashley J Williams Part 2 of 2
